channel.title: containers on Pulse Code
channel.description: Recent content in containers on Pulse Code

item.title: Kubernetes - Tech Primer
item.description: I've been working on this one for a long time, but I think it's finally ready for the world. Kubernetes is a huge topic and I wanted to condense down my learnings over the past 12 months, into some digestible & re-usable form, so I created another of my tech primers. This goes fairly deep and is designed for a technical audience, so is much more than a quick overview of Kubernetes (altogether there is some of that).
